alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lion Country Safari Park, or 9 miles northwest of Wellington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Haverhill, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR, Lakeside Green, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Stacey Street, Florida Gardens and Century Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
